Package by.rozmysl.booking.model.dao.user

Class BookingDaoImp

java.lang.Object
by.rozmysl.booking.model.dao.impl.BookingDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Dao<Booking,​java.lang.Long>, BookingDao
public class BookingDaoImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements BookingDao
Provides the base model implementation for `BOOKING` table DAO with the ConnectionSource properties.
